showRangeIndicator.name: Show reach indicator
showRangeIndicator.hint: Show reach indicator for controlled token.

showRangeIndicatorAll.name: Show reach indicator for all
showRangeIndicatorAll.hint: Show reach indicator for all tokens.

toggleRotationOnMove.name: Toggle Rotation on Move
toggleRotationOnMove.hint: Temporarily turn on or off automatic rotation on move for this user. Will only have an effect if Automatic Rotation on Move is turned on in the core settings.

retreat.name: Retreat
retreat.hint: Move selected token(s) 1 grid unit backwards and keep facing.

maxReachShown.name: Maximal reach shown
maxReachShown.description: Maximal Reach shown in reach indicator.

reachIndicatorOverdraw.name: Reach indicator Color overdraw
reachIndicatorOverdraw.description: How far the facing color is drawn beyond max reach. 0: not at all, 1: full yard

innerBorderWidth.name: Inner border width
innerBorderWidth.description: Width of the inner border in px.

outerBorderWidth.name: Outer border width
outerBorderWidth.description: Width of the outer border in px.

reachLineAlpha.name: Reach indicator line opacity
reachLineAlpha.description: Opacity of the reach lines in the reach indicator.

facingAlpha.name: Facing area opacity
facingAlpha.description: Opacity of the facing areas in the reach indicator.

GURPSMovementEnabled.name: Enable GURPS tokens shapes and movement on Hex-Grids
GURPSMovementEnabled.description: Enable GURPS specific movement and hex shapes on hex-Grids. WARNING: This will change token settings on all scenes in this world. Disabling this option will revert the changes. Please disable the setting before removing this module, otherwise the changes will persist.

VisionAdjustmentEnabled.name: Adjust Vision
VisionAdjustmentEnabled.description: Adjusts vision origin for multihex tokens so that the complete token is visible to itself.

alwaysShowOuterBorder.name: Always show outer border
alwaysShowOuterBorder.description: When on, the outer border with the facing colors will be always shown for all visible tokens. When off, it will only be shown for the selected token or on hover (as the inner border).

showToggleRotationButton.name: Show Toggle Rotation on Movement Button
showToggleRotationButton.description: When on, the Toggle Rotation on Movement Button will be shown in the left toolbar. In order for this setting change to take effect you will need to reload Foundry.

facingIndicatorImage.name: Custom facing arrow
facingIndicatorImage.description: Image file for a custom facing indicator. Keep empty to use the default indicator.

facingIndicatorGap.name: Facing arrow offset
facingIndicatorGap.description: Offset of the facing arrow from the token front in grid units.

facingIndicatorFillColor.name: Default facing arrow fill color
facingIndicatorFillColor.description: Fill color of the default facing arrow.

facingIndicatorLineColor.name: Default facing arrow outline color
facingIndicatorLineColor.description: Outline color of the default facing arrow.

facingIndicatorAlpha.name: Default facing arrow opacity
facingIndicatorAlpha.description: Opacity of the default facing arrow.

shiftTokensInSameHex.name: Shift Tokens in same hex
shiftTokensInSameHex.description: Experimental: When enabled, tokens that are in the same hex with other tokens will be shifted outward so they can better be selected. Only on hex grids.

tokenShiftDistance.name: Token shift distance
tokenShiftDistance.description: The distance tokens in the same hex will be shifted outward.

tokenSettings.explanation: Note from GURPS Token Shape and Movement: Some token properties have been removed from this section and can now be set in the GURPS Token Shape tab.

maxReachShown.placeholder: Leave empty to use global setting
maxReachShown.name: Maximal reach shown

imageOffsetY.name: Lengthwise Image Offset
imageOffsetY.note: Shifts the token image forward on positive values and back on negative values relative to the token border

imageOffsetX.name: Sideward Image Offset
imageOffsetX.note: Shifts the token image right on positive values and left on negative values relative to the token border

tokenWidth.name: Width
tokenWidth.note: Will be rounded to full hexes on hex grids. Warning: There is no useful shape for tokens with a length of 1 and a width > 1 on hex grids.

tokenLength.name: Length
tokenLength.note: Will be rounded to full hexes on hex grids.  Warning: There is no useful shape for tokens with a length of 1 and a width > 1 on hex grids.

rotationOffsetY.name: Lengthwise Offset
rotationOffsetY.note: With this module, the default center of rotation will be the center front hex of the token shape. Use this setting to shift it along the length oft the token. Will be rounded to full hexes on hex grids.

rotationOffsetX.name: Sideward Offset
rotationOffsetX.note: Use this setting to shift the center of rotation along the width oft the token. Will be rounded to full hexes on hex grids. Note that shifting by a number of hexes not dividable by two will move the border of grid.

facingIndicatorEnabled.name: Enable facing arrow
facingIndicatorEnabled.note: Enables the facing arrow if facing arrows are enabled in the global settings.

facingIndicatorImage.name: Custom facing arrow
facingIndicatorImage.note: Custom facing arrow image. Leave empty to use the default arrow.
